gameplay.attacks

Class Attack

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • gameplay.attacks.MovingSprite
            • gameplay.attacks.Attack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Howl, Lightning, Lunge, MeleeAttack, Projectile, SnowField, TrailingAttack, Trap

    public class Attack
extends MovingSprite
    A damaging or status-causing effect that an Avatar can create
    Author:
    shaylandias
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Attack

        public Attack(java.lang.String imageKey,
              int x,
              int y,
              int w,
              int h,
              java.lang.String playerAddress,
              double damage,
              boolean shieldBreaker,
              StatusEffect effect,
              double dir,
              long time)
        Creates an Attack with the specified properties
        Parameters:
        imageKey - The key leading to the image in Resources
        x - The starting x-coordinate
        y - The starting y-coordinate
        w - The width
        h - The height
        playerAddress - The IP address of the player
        damage - Damage caused by this attack
        shieldBreaker - True if this attack breaks through shields
        effect - The StatusEffect that this Attack inflicts
        dir - The direction of the Attack
        time - The time of instantiation on the server

        Returns:

        public boolean act(java.util.ArrayList<Avatar> avatars,
                   long time)
        What this Attack should do each time the game loop moves forward
        Parameters:
        avatars - The Avatars that this Attack could possibly hit
        time - The current server time
        Returns:
        Returns true if was successful, false if the projectile is now inactive
